title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1600.8 - Appeal
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1600.8 - Appeal

State Regulations

Any applicant denied access to a record for whatever reason
may appeal such denial decision by directing a written appeal to John J. Sauerwald, Executive Director of the New York Temporary State Commission on

Constitutional Tax Limitations, Agency Building #4, Empire State Plaza, Albany, New York 12223. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1600.8

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
